Pre-Game Insights: This is the first T20I match between England and Scotland
England are the defending champions in the T20 World Cup
Scotland made it to this World Cup after acing the regional European Qualifiers
Others: The match will take place on June 4, 2024, at Kensington Oval, Bridgetown, Barbados
England have won their last 2 matches against Pakistan before the World Cup
Scotland lost their warm-up match against Afghanistan before the World Cup
